titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the Merit Systems Protection Board.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/14/1993--Introduced. Amends the Whistleblower Protection Act of 1989 to authorize appropriations for the Merit Systems Protection Board without fiscal year limitation (currently, appropriations are authorized through FY 1994).
